ygData.subject: Re: EQ - worse rpg ever?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes- I do agree with a lot of the messages. Nothing is ever perfect, and I chose to gripe about what was not perfect. Everquest is a great game besides the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes- I do agree with a lot of the messages. Nothing is ever perfect, and I
chose to gripe about what was not perfect. Everquest is a great game besides
the events I had to endure.
Perhaps I did venture with some bad people- I have learned from the earlier
posts that there are some great people out there in EQ. Perhaps I just have
the worse luck in the world when I am grouping.
I am sorry to place my anger on EQ on this mailing list. I just wish people
wouldnt think about reaching that next level so much- but I have learned from
the earlier posts that it is not true.
I must have the worse luck on meeting people on the two servers I mainly
play!! Sorry everyone :) igore my earlier posts :)
T Alexander
